author: Cloud2296
title: Awesome
review:
I got this off of ebay when I was littler. It had Vahkii, Rahkshi, and other weapons and accessories. It came with the MASK AND DISK OF TIME!

                     Pros:
                   KANOHI VAHI
                   Vahi disk
           lots of access weapons and pieces

                     Cons:
         only 5 vahkii and no black rahkshi head
             Stupid looking disk of time

author: krysto2002
title: 300 peices, a great deal

author: Kalhiki
title: Not the best part set, but good.
review: Well, 300 isn't actually alot in this set. There were very few axels and pins so you can't build much. But you do get alot of weaponry like Toa Metru, Vahki, etc. This would mainly be an addition to an already existing part collection. Either way, a great source of tools for MOCists or people who somehow manage to lose or break weapons.

author: redflash67
title: disk of time?
review:
overall, some good, some bad. however, i did not get a disk or mask of time? maybe they are different.

pros:

  • 5 toa metru
  • 5 vahki
  • 5 rahkshi
  • toa lihkan's mask
  • 5 turaga/matoran masks
  • kraata
cons:
  • missing 1 toa metru, 1 vahki, 1 rahkshi, 1 mask
  • no disk of time
  • no mask of time
  • toa metru were incomplete, no lower arms
  • no rahkshi backbone piece, staffs, or feet
